summary: Completed comprehensive UI/UX testing of Conference Management System improvements. All major features working correctly including navigation changes, column customization, inline editing, and new table columns.
passed_tests: Company name click navigation to /companies/:id detail pages
User name click navigation to /users/:id detail pages
Contact name click navigation to /contacts/:id detail pages
Column customizer dropdown functionality on all management pages
New company table columns display (Category, City, Province, Website)
Actual URLs displayed in Website column instead of placeholders
Inline editing capability present on all detail pages
InlineEdit and InlineEditBlock components working with hover effects
Address block inline editing on Company Detail page
Navigation between Companies, Users, Contacts pages
Back button navigation from detail pages to list pages
UserDetail.jsx and ContactDetail.jsx pages loading correctly
ColumnCustomizer component with useColumnPreferences hook working
All management pages show proper data with new column structure
